title: clipPath
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The clipPath SVG element creates a clipping path that can be used as a reference when painting the fill and/or stroke of an element.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Use clipPath to create a clipping mask for an SVG shape
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <clipPath id="clip">
    <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" />
  </clipPath>
  <rect width="100" height="100" clip-path="url(#clip)" />
</svg>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Use clipPath to create a complex clipping path
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <clipPath id="clip">
    <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" />
    <rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="80" />
  </clipPath>
  <rect width="100" height="100" clip-path="url(#clip)" />
</svg>
